snippet: Sadara Ventures, which has raised $28.7 million for a new fund backed by institutional investors, is joining a growing wave of venture capitalists plowing money into the Palestinian territories.
abstract: Sadara Ventures, which has raised $28.7 million for a new fund backed by institutional investors, is joining a growing wave of venture capitalists plowing money into the Palestinian territories.

headline.main: Early Investors See Promise in Palestinian Start-Ups
headline.print_headline: Early Investors See Promise in Palestinian Start-Ups
